# SoraSegment.CustomMusic method

自定义音乐分享 消息段

```csharp
public static SoraSegment CustomMusic(string url, string musicUrl, string title, 
    string content = null, string coverImageUrl = null)
```

| --- | --- |
| url | 跳转URL |
| musicUrl | 音乐URL |
| title | 标题 |
| content | 内容描述[可选] |
